Document.Focus: Concussion - what to ask your doctor - child

Synonyms.Synonym: What to ask your doctor about concussion - child
Brain injury - mild - what to ask your doctor - child

QAPair.Question: What is (are) Concussion - what to ask your doctor - child ?
QAPair.Answer: Your child has a mild brain injury ( concussion ). This may affect how your child's brain works for some time. Your child may have lost consciousness for a while. Your child also may have a bad headache. Below are some questions you may want to ask your health care provider to help you take care of your child's concussion.
